jobPlacement.text: Join {{count}}+ learners who landed jobs at {{companies}} with these skills

descriptions.excel: Master Microsoft Excel from basics to advanced features. Learn data analysis, pivot tables, formulas, and automation to boost your productivity and career prospects.
descriptions.tableau: Learn data visualization with Tableau. Create stunning dashboards, analyze complex datasets, and tell compelling stories with your data.
descriptions.sql: Master SQL database management and queries. Learn to extract, manipulate, and analyze data from relational databases with confidence.
descriptions.python: Learn Python programming from fundamentals to advanced applications. Build projects, automate tasks, and develop software solutions.
descriptions.dataScience: Comprehensive data science course covering statistics, machine learning, and data analysis using Python and R.
descriptions.machineLearning: Master machine learning algorithms, neural networks, and AI applications with hands-on projects.
descriptions.ai: Explore artificial intelligence concepts, deep learning, and practical AI applications in various industries.
descriptions.powerBI: Learn Microsoft Power BI for business intelligence, data visualization, and interactive dashboard creation.
descriptions.react: Master React.js for building modern, interactive web applications with component-based architecture.
descriptions.javascript: Learn JavaScript programming for web development, from basics to advanced frameworks and libraries.
descriptions.noeCodeWebDev: Explore artificial intelligence concepts, deep learning, and practical AI applications in various industries.
descriptions.reactFundamentals: Master React.js for building modern, interactive web applications with component-based architecture.
descriptions.frontendDevelopment: Frontend development is the practice of building the visual part of a website or app that users interact with directly. It involves three core technologies: HTML – structures the content CSS – styles and designs the layout JavaScript – adds interactivity and dynamic behavior Modern frontend also uses frameworks (like React, Vue, Angular) and tools (like Tailwind, Next.js) to build faster, responsive, and engaging user experiences.
descriptions.webProjectDevelopment: Build complete web projects from concept to deployment. Learn full-stack development techniques, project planning, version control, and modern deployment strategies to create professional web applications.
descriptions.backendMern: Master backend development using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js). Learn to build scalable APIs, manage databases, implement authentication, and create full-stack applications with modern JavaScript technologies.
descriptions.angular: Learn Angular framework for building dynamic single-page applications. Master TypeScript, components, services, and modern Angular features for enterprise-level web development.
descriptions.vue: Master Vue.js framework for building progressive web applications. Learn component-based architecture, state management, and modern Vue ecosystem tools.
descriptions.nodejs: Learn Node.js for server-side JavaScript development. Build scalable backend applications, APIs, and microservices using modern JavaScript runtime.
descriptions.django: Master Django framework for rapid Python web development. Learn to build secure, scalable web applications with built-in admin, ORM, and security features.
descriptions.flask: Learn Flask framework for Python web development. Build lightweight, flexible web applications and APIs with minimal setup and maximum control.
descriptions.fullStack: Comprehensive full-stack development course covering both frontend and backend technologies. Learn to build complete web applications from database to user interface.
descriptions.mlRegression: This course contains selected modules from 'Data Science'. Comprehensive Data Science Complete Course course covering all essential topics and practical applications. This course includes hands-on projects, real-world examples, and step-by-step guidance to master data science complete course concepts.
descriptions.eda: This course contains selected modules from 'Data Science'. Comprehensive Data Science Complete Course course covering all essential topics and practical applications. This course includes hands-on projects, real-world examples, and step-by-step guidance to master data science complete course concepts.
descriptions.mlClassification: This course contains selected modules from 'Data Science'. Comprehensive Data Science Complete Course course covering all essential topics and practical applications. This course includes hands-on projects, real-world examples, and step-by-step guidance to master data science complete course concepts.
descriptions.aiNlp: Explore artificial intelligence concepts, deep learning, and practical AI applications in various industries.
descriptions.neuralNetworks: Explore artificial intelligence concepts, deep learning, and practical AI applications in various industries.
descriptions.advancedMachineLearning: Master machine learning algorithms, neural networks, and AI applications with hands-on projects.
descriptions.default: Comprehensive course designed to enhance your skills and boost your career prospects with hands-on projects and industry-recognized certification.

excel.objective1: Master Excel formulas, functions, and advanced calculations
excel.objective2: Create dynamic pivot tables and data analysis reports
excel.objective3: Build interactive dashboards and data visualizations
excel.objective4: Automate tasks using Excel macros and VBA
excel.objective5: Implement advanced data modeling and forecasting techniques

tableau.objective1: Create professional interactive dashboards and reports
tableau.objective2: Master data connection and preparation techniques
tableau.objective3: Build advanced calculated fields and table calculations
tableau.objective4: Design compelling data stories and presentations
tableau.objective5: Implement best practices for data visualization design

sql.objective1: Write complex SQL queries for data extraction and analysis
sql.objective2: Design and optimize database schemas and relationships
sql.objective3: Master advanced joins, subqueries, and window functions
sql.objective4: Implement stored procedures and database automation
sql.objective5: Optimize query performance and database management

python.objective1: Master Python syntax, data structures, and algorithms
python.objective2: Build web applications using popular frameworks
python.objective3: Implement data analysis and visualization projects
python.objective5: Develop machine learning and AI applications

default.objective1: Gain practical, hands-on experience with industry tools
default.objective2: Build a portfolio of real-world projects
default.objective3: Master essential skills for career advancement

excel.feature1: Comprehensive Excel curriculum from basics to advanced
excel.feature2: Real-world business case studies and projects
excel.feature3: Advanced data analysis and visualization techniques
excel.feature4: Automation with macros and VBA programming

tableau.feature1: Professional Tableau Desktop training and certification
tableau.feature2: Hands-on dashboard creation with real datasets

sql.feature1: Complete SQL curriculum for all database systems
sql.feature2: Advanced query optimization and performance tuning

default.feature1: Comprehensive curriculum designed by industry experts
default.feature5: 24/7 access to course materials and resources

excel.requirement1: Basic computer skills and Microsoft Excel installed
excel.requirement2: No prior Excel experience required - suitable for beginners
excel.requirement3: Willingness to practice with provided datasets and exercises

tableau.requirement2: Basic understanding of data concepts helpful but not required
tableau.requirement3: Computer with minimum 8GB RAM for optimal performance

sql.requirement1: Access to a SQL database system (free options provided)
sql.requirement2: Basic computer skills and logical thinking ability

default.requirement1: Basic computer literacy and internet access
default.requirement2: Motivation to learn and complete hands-on projects
default.requirement3: No prior experience required - designed for beginners

includesList.item1: Lifetime access to course content and updates
includesList.item5: Regular live Q&A sessions with instructors
includesList.item6: Career guidance and job placement assistance

assessments.description: Discover your strengths and areas for improvement with our comprehensive assessments designed to help you grow and succeed.
assessments.noAssessmentsDescription: We're working on bringing you amazing assessments. Check back soon for new opportunities to test your skills!

kakatiyaAssessment.title: Kakatiya University Entrance Assessment
kakatiyaAssessment.description: Complete this assessment to showcase your AI and full-stack development skills and qualify for our scholarship program.
kakatiyaAssessment.fullDescription: Welcome to the Kakatiya University Entrance Assessment! Instructions: 1. This assessment contains multiple-choice questions covering various topics including Mathematics, Logical Reasoning, English, and Programming. 2. You have 120 minutes to complete the assessment. 3. Each question has four options (A, B, C, D). Select the best answer. 4. Once you submit an answer, you cannot change it. 5. Make sure you have a stable internet connection. 6. Do not refresh the page during the assessment. Good luck!

instructions.welcome: Welcome to the Kakatiya University Entrance Assessment!
instructions.instruction1: This assessment contains multiple-choice questions covering various topics including Mathematics, Logical Reasoning, English, and Programming.
instructions.instruction2: You have 120 minutes to complete the assessment.
instructions.instruction3: Each question has four options (A, B, C, D). Select the best answer.
instructions.instruction4: Once you submit an answer, you cannot change it.
instructions.instruction5: Make sure you have a stable internet connection.
instructions.instruction6: Do not refresh the page during the assessment.

sections.unlockPerks: UNLOCK THESE PERKS WITH THE TEST
sections.whyMattersText: We're already in touch with companies actively hiring for AI-powered and no-code roles. If you ace this assessment, you may qualify directly for placement interviews with our partner companies.
sections.whatIfLowScore: What if you don't score high?
sections.whatIfLowScoreText: No worries. That's exactly why we're here.
sections.personalizedPath: If your results show there's room to grow, we'll offer you personalized upskilling pathways — through our industry-grade programs — designed to help you become a high-impact individual in AI and full-stack development.
sections.directAccess: Direct access to interviews with hiring partners
sections.personalizedFeedback: Personalized feedback on your current strengths and areas to grow
sections.flagshipProgram: A chance to join our flagship career-launching program and move closer to your dream job
sections.careerLaunchingProgram: A chance to join our flagship career-launching program and move closer to your dream job

jobs.title: Find Your Dream Job
jobs.subtitle: Today
jobs.description: Discover thousands of job opportunities from top companies. Take the next step in your career journey with positions that match your skills and aspirations.

descriptions.1: CellStrat is a dynamic AI startup specializing in comprehensive AI consulting for US-based clients. Lead AI/ML engineering for global client projects and CellVerse product development. Architect and design scalable AI systems from conception to deployment.
descriptions.2: Lead frontend development for client projects and CellVerse product platform. Architect and design frontend repositories with optimal performance and scalability. Build pixel-perfect, responsive web applications using our modern tech stack.
descriptions.3: We are seeking a talented AI Developer with expertise in foundation models for Image, Video, and VLLMs. Apply your skills in developing cutting-edge AI solutions.
descriptions.4: Lead our AI team in developing comprehensive solutions with foundation models. Drive technological innovation, mentor the team, and focus on production efficiency.
descriptions.5: Exciting opportunity for a visionary AI Founding Engineer to shape the future of AI technology at Cenna. Be a key player in building groundbreaking AI solutions.
descriptions.6: Join UltraSafe AI in developing innovative AI solutions focused on security and safety technologies. Help create intelligent systems that protect and empower.
descriptions.7: Genloop is seeking a Senior AI Engineer to lead complex AI projects and drive technological innovation. Ideal for experienced professionals looking to make a significant impact.
descriptions.8: Velodata Global is looking for a talented AI Engineer to contribute to innovative data-driven solutions. Help us transform complex data into actionable insights.
descriptions.9: AiSensy is expanding its AI team and seeking a skilled Artificial Intelligence Engineer. Contribute to developing intelligent communication and automation solutions.
descriptions.10: KLA is seeking a talented Artificial Intelligence Engineer to join our innovative team. Help develop cutting-edge AI solutions and drive technological advancement.
descriptions.11: Hike is looking for a skilled ML Engineer to work on innovative remote projects. Help develop machine learning solutions that push the boundaries of technology.
descriptions.12: Indsafri is expanding its AI team and seeking a passionate Artificial Intelligence Engineer. Contribute to developing innovative AI solutions across various domains.
descriptions.13: Eudia is seeking an AI Engineer to join our on-site team in Bengaluru. Help develop cutting-edge AI solutions and drive technological innovation.
descriptions.14: Predigle is looking for a talented AI Engineer to join our innovative team. Contribute to developing advanced AI solutions and drive technological progress.
descriptions.15: Mundos is seeking an AI Fullstack Engineer to work remotely. Develop comprehensive AI solutions that integrate frontend and backend technologies.
descriptions.16: APPSeCONNECT is looking for an AI Research Engineer to lead innovative research projects. Drive technological advancements and develop cutting-edge AI solutions.
descriptions.17: Valuebound is expanding its AI team and seeking a skilled Artificial Intelligence Engineer. Contribute to developing innovative AI solutions and drive technological innovation.
descriptions.18: Join Microsoft AI team to build next-generation intelligent systems. Work on cutting-edge AI technologies including Azure AI services, Copilot, and foundation models that power millions of users worldwide.
descriptions.19: Amazon is seeking Applied Scientists to work on Alexa, AWS AI services, and next-generation AI products. Drive innovation in natural language processing, computer vision, and recommendation systems.
descriptions.20: Lead AI architecture and strategy for Microsoft's flagship products. Design scalable AI systems that serve billions of users across Office 365, Azure, and Windows ecosystems.
descriptions.21: Join the Alexa AI team to build intelligent voice experiences. Work on speech recognition, natural language understanding, and conversational AI that powers millions of Alexa devices worldwide.

1: Deep understanding of Large Language Models (LLMs) internals
Advanced experience with LLM APIs (OpenAI GPT, Claude, Gemini)
Hands-on with vector databases and similarity search

Knowledge of responsive and mobile-first design

Knowledge of algorithms and data structures

Proven track record of leading technical teams

Advanced knowledge of deep learning techniques

13: Proficiency in programming and AI frameworks

Experience with Azure AI services and cloud platforms

Strong research background with publications in top-tier conferences
Expertise in deep learning, NLP, or computer vision

20: Extensive experience in AI system architecture and design
Deep knowledge of Azure AI platform and services
Experience with large-scale distributed AI systems
Strong leadership and technical mentoring skills
Expertise in AI ethics and responsible AI practices
Experience with Kubernetes, microservices, and cloud architecture
8+ years of AI/ML experience with 3+ years in architecture roles
21: Strong background in machine learning and NLP
Experience with speech recognition and voice technologies
Proficiency in Python, Java, and ML frameworks
